meanings.sent1: In our cousinhoods, we often play together.
meanings.sent2: Family reunions are a great time to celebrate cousinhoods.
meanings.sent3: Our cousinhoods always make family gatherings more fun.
meanings.sent4: The bond of cousinhoods is like a special club only we belong to.
meanings.sent5: Growing up together created strong cousinhoods among us.

meanings.sent1: The cousinhoods between us are filled with laughter and shared memories.
meanings.sent2: Maintaining cousinhoods through regular visits is important.
meanings.sent3: Our cousinhoods make family events more lively.
meanings.sent4: The cousinhoods we share are like branches of the same family tree.
meanings.sent5: The cousinhoods we have are cherished and valued.

meanings.sent1: Our cousinhoods always have a blast when we get together.
meanings.sent2: The cousinhoods at the family picnic enjoyed playing games.
meanings.sent3: The cousinhoods decided to have a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent4: The cousinhoods gathered for a group photo at the reunion.
meanings.sent5: The cousinhoods shared stories and jokes during the holiday dinner.
